query.description: css selector for element to check

count.description: the quantity of items to check

property.description: the property name to check the value on

assert.description: Check if a value, attribute or property equals expected values

attributes.description: validate multiple attributes checking that their values are as expected
dictionary where the key is the attribute name and the value, the expected attribute value

attribute_eq.description: Check that an attribute value and expected value match

attribute_neq.description: Check that an attribute value and expected value do NOT match

child_count_eq.description: check that the number of child elements match the expected count

child_count_neq.description: check that the number of child elements are NOT equal to specified count

style_property_eq.description: check that a element's style property has a expected value

style_property_neq.description: check that a element's style property is different to the defined value

element_property_eq.description: check that a element's property has a expected value

element_property_neq.description: check that a element's property is different to the defined value

tag_name_eq.description: check that a element tag name is what was expected

tag_name_neq.description: check that a elements tag name is different to what is defined

tpl:args.value: tag_name that it should not be

text_content_eq.description: check that the text content of a element matches the defined value

text_content_neq.description: check that the text content of a element is NOT the defined value

value_eq.description: check that the value property of a input matches the defined value

value_neq.description: check that the value property of the input does NOT match the defined value

navigate.description: using the browser url, navigate to a page

close_window.description: for a given index, close that window or tab

index.description: the index of the tab to close

refresh.description: ask the browser to refresh the page

ctrl.description: hold ctrl down during the click operation

alt.description: hold the alt key down during the click operation

dbl_click.description: dbl click on a defined element

context_click.description: right click on a defined element

click_sequence.description: perform a sequence of click events over multiple elements

sequence.description: array of queries defining items to click on

press_key.description: perform a key press on a defined element

print_screen.description: capture the screen as png and save to the rest results folder

file.description: file path to save screenshot too

select_option.description: select an option from a select element

switch_to_frame.description: set the focus on a defined frame element so that it becomes the queryable context

switch_to_default.description: switch back to the default window, normally used to exit a frame

switch_to_tab.description: for the given index, switch to that tab

index.description: index number of the tab to switch too

type_text.description: type text into a defined input element

wait.description: Wait for a expected element, attribute, property or value. Fail if value does not appear before timeout
